Articles.Content:
This is the Feenicks Mk.2, it is a small, one kerbal rocket designed for Munar landings. It has a large fuel reserve despite it's small stature and is forgiving to new users in flight. I didn't design it with any action groups, though it's jet engines require a different flight technique than straight rockets. I've outlined how to fly the craft as well as how to build the more complex parts in the in game vehicle description. Below I've included the download link as well as a few pics. I know that one is a night pic, I happened to like how it looked though, so included it. The last pic is the lander and braking stage in orbit around the Mun.

DOWNLOAD: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/feenicks-mk-2/
